name: Split Personality
description:
- Arrow Keys = move

- Z = select

you play as a person experiencing split personality disorder, you have created this scenario inside your mind, You must survive your inner thoughts to reach singularity. (so;;y, I know x))

Music = https://soundcloud.com/stevenobrien/night-walk

Thank you  Game Endeavor for hosting this jam enabling me to learn so much :)

As stated above I learnt a lot from this experience, actually making my first proper "game", I may come back to this game and add some polish (because lets be real this game needs some polish) I would like to add my own music, sounds and animations for the player and enemies.
